document_data.name: ''Gloves of Accuracy''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gloves of accuracy''''' were [[enchanted]] gloves that made [[archers]] more effective in battle. They could be found in [[Waterdeep]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: The ''gloves of accuracy'' helped to steady an archer's aim, thus increasing their accuracy.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Saarvin]], a [[dragonborn]] [[ranger]] and [[adventurer]] possessed a pair of ''gloves of accuracy'' while working with [[Laeral Silverhand]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
